participant_1.background:
I lost my job as a nurse after I was diagnosed with cancer.
green is my favorite color.
i m in the military.
I love to take my horse, Beauty, for rides on the weekends.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.

participant_2.background:
I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
I'm a bit nervous about going to the baby shower because I'm worried about being stared at.
I have no use for a crib, but I would love to have a music studio in my dorm room.
I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you! And how are you?
I am doing well, thank you!
That is good to hear! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to ride my horse, Beauty, on the weekends. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my cat, Charlie. I also enjoy going to concerts and playing music.
That is great! I love music too. I play the guitar and piano.
That is awesome! I play the guitar and drums.
Wow! We have a lot in common!
I know! It is so nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
Me too! I am glad we met.
Me too! We should get together sometime and play music together.
That would be fun! I would love to play music with you.
Great! We can exchange contact information and set up a time to meet.
Perfect! I am looking forward to it!
